data.description:
Get your time through a rolling odometer-style watchface. From tenths of a minute through to the year, all fields "roll with the changes", just like an old style car odometer. Includes configuration of background color.

PLEASE NOTE: By default, this watchface is continually in motion which will have an impact on your battery life. A number of settings on the configuration page allow you to significantly extend your battery life by restricting animation when you're sleeping, only when minutes change, or only when your Pebble is tapped.

latest_release.release_notes: Fix improperly "fast scrolling" digits.

changelog.release_notes: -- Recompiled using Pebble SDK 4
-- Improved method for checking elapsed time since last weather update
-- Switched weather provider from Yahoo! Weather to OpenWeatherMap.org
- Added an option to always display a seconds hand
- Slightly lengthened the watch hands
- Fixed an issue with retrieving Yahoo! Weather using GPS (credit: Freakified)
- Improvements to battery usage
- Added option to shake to briefly display a seconds hand
-- Updated to display "....." for "Unknown" Yahoo! Weather conditions
-- Fixed an issue when Yahoo! Weather returned an 'Unknown' weather condition
- Added an option to use thinner watch hands
- Added option to display hour markers as numeric values

data.description:
A highly configurable analog watchface containing weather information and optional date/battery display lines.

- Select colors for watch hands, time markers, background and text items
- Select how often OpenWeatherMap.org weather information is updated
- Retrieve weather information using GPS or by manually entering location
- Option to display today's lo - hi temperatures (+last weather update time)
- Display hour markers as numeric values
- Option to always display a seconds hand, or battery-friendly alternative to briefly display a seconds hand with a shake
- Option to use watch hands with a thinner width
- Vibrate on Bluetooth disconnect option
- Options to display time in digital format and battery percentage

If you're enjoying the ANALOG WD watchface, please click the heart above. You may also send feedback using the Support link below.

latest_release.release_notes: -- Recompiled using Pebble SDK 4

data.title: Analog Weather

data.description:
This watch face shows you the current time in two ways : numeric and analogic.
On the left, you find the date and weekday.
On the right, the week number.
On the bottom : battery level and Bluetooth status.
Colors are different for every day of the week (black and white for Pebble). 
At night (6.00 pm to 8.00 am), colors are changed to more contrasted ones.
This first version does not have, for instant, configuration feature.

latest_release.release_notes: v1.2 : fix minor problem for minute hand color at night

data.description:
Updated Time Slider App with lots of configurable options!

This is similar to many other ruler watch faces in which the time slides from right to left.  However I tried to simplify the interface so you can quickly see general time at a glance.

I recommend using the 'Blue' or 'Green' preset color combinations for best experience.


Lots of configurations!
 - Localization
 - 12 or 24 hour mode
 - Battery/Bluetooth Status
 - Bluetooth Vibrate
 - Show/Hide Minute Slider
 - Show/Hide Year Slider
 - Show/Hide Header Time
 - Show/Hide Header Time Seconds
 - Pre-Set & Custom Colors

Enjoy!!

<< Thank you Tony V on Android Config Fix & French Settings! >>

latest_release.release_notes: Thank you Tony V on Android Config Fix & French Settings!

data.author: MicroByte

changelog.release_notes: Updated config server

* More Customization Options for to turn the Ticks/Hash lines and Date off
* Hand render tuning
* Stability Updates

* Power saving options added.  Saver Mode turns off all additional features and turns on a minimal mode face to conserve battery life.  

You can specify to turn on Minimal Mode: 
  - when your battery reaches a percentage you specify
  - during certain start/end times through the day that you specify.  Want the watch to save battery life while you're sleeping?  Specify when to start and end and the face will do that for you.

* FULL color customization options!  Have it your way.  You want a pink face with red ticks and yellow hands? You can do that!
* Stability Improvements

New Features:

* New Themes (more customization options on the way)
* Bluetooth / Hourly vibrate options
* Show or Hide the Left and/or Right Complication
* Pick whatever timezone you want and Label the complications whatever you want

* Added the ability to hide the left and right time circles
* Bug Fixes
* Improved Stability

* Bug fixes
* Updated to allow Seconds hand to be turned on or off.  Turning seconds off will increase watchface efficiency and extend battery life.
Initial Release

data.description:
A face for those that bravely travel effortlessly across the globe - nomads, vagabonds, wanderers...

Or for those that are just bored and are curious what time it is on the other side of the planet..

Either way, Globetrot allows you to view your current time as well as select 2 other times from other parts of the world.  Select from a list of popular cities or just specify your own timezone and label - set it up as YOU like!


Other Features:

* FULL Color Customization Options

* Don't want to use the complications, turn them off and have a simple analog face.

* Bluetooth / Hourly vibrate options 

* Turn Date on or off

* Turn Ticks/Hash marks on or off

* Customize Complications - Pick and label whatever timezone you want 

* Power saver options to enable a minimal mode during times you specify or at a certain battery level

As always, please heart if you like this watchface!

latest_release.release_notes: Updated config server

changelog.release_notes: Time for an update! The rectangular version adapts to the screen now.
The version for the silver PTR was flawed. Fixed That.
SGMNTS went through some error corrections and is also available for the Pebble Time now!

data.description:
Summary: analog segments
Readability: medium
Examples: 12:59 in various states, 04:36(PTS except gold, PT except red), 06:25 (PTS gold), 08:47(PT  red), 12:59 (PTS except gold, PT except red)

SGMNTS is an analog watch inspired digital watchface. It's built up from outside to the inside, from bottom layer to top layer, telling the hours, ten-minute-increments and single minutes by segments that are placed at the well known analog watch number positions. The size of the segments varies every time the display refreshes, giving the watchface a different fractured look. The size does NOT matter here, just the amount of segments for the different parts of time. The angle of the final segment is extended to the 360° to fill the display before it gets empty again (going back to 0). The colors look different depending on the color of the Pebble Time round. Please check the example times and the header of this description.  

Design / Programming / Copyright © 2012, 2015 Sam Jerichow

latest_release.release_notes: Time for an update! The rectangular version adapts to the screen now.

data.title: SGMNTS

- Low battery indicator threshold

data.author: Nev Rawlins

changelog.release_notes: Added support for Pebble 2 and Quick Views
Fixed problem where date was not being displayed on a shake on b&w Pebbles.  One of the Pebble firmware updates must have changed image settings.

Reworked configuration. Supports configuration when phone not connected to internet. If phone is connected to internet, then configuration changes show on watch interactively. On black and white Pebble screens, foreground & background can be set independently, with additional color for each: grey.
Adds configuration option to disable the date appearing on shake.  This enables the default action of brightening the time display.
Version for all Pebbles (version 1 was private and just for rectangular Pebbles)

data.description:
Duo can be configured to display in digital or analog mode.

Digital mode is quite easy to read and displays in 24 or 12 hour mode, depending on watch settings.  In 12 hour mode, a PM symbol appears near the center in the bottom right quadrant (this also appears in analog mode).

Analog mode, is harder to read.  The hour “hand” is set closer to the center of the watch face and the 00-55 Minute “hand” is furthest away. Both hands are slightly curved, with the exception of the 12, 3, 6,& 9 hours which are displayed as straight lines. Single minutes are located in the middle as 4 small straight vertical bars.

A shake of the wrist brings up the date mode for a few seconds.   This can be shown in DD/MM or MM/DD format by configuration.  A date symbol appears near the center in the top left quadrant.

Configuration option gives a choice of colors for foreground and background on the settings screen.   If same color is chosen for both, watchface converts foreground to black or white to ensure it still shows.

  
Screenshots show:  
(1)   6:59AM (digital)
(2)   3:19AM (analog)
(3) 10:11PM (analog)  
(4) September 22 (date mode, DDMM)
(5) 10:01PM (digital)

This watchface design was created by Justin Schofield, from the UK, and is published with the designer's permission.

latest_release.release_notes: Added support for Pebble 2 and Quick Views

data.description:
An LCARS watchface with a circular layout.

Choose from many background colour schemes, or have time text orange/white.

Bluetooth is indicated by the bottom middle rectangle disappearing if BT is lost.

The battery level is graphically shown down the left side, with a text number middle left.

Weather by yahoo, 30min updates.

Many more options.

Languages supported include,

 - English
 - Dutch
 - German
 - French
 - Croatian
 - Italian

 - Norwegian
 - Finnish
 - Danish
 - Turkish
 - Swedish
 - Catalan

data.description:

The images are public Flickr images with geotags.

There are many custom settings, including refresh interval, digital/analog watchface, date format, battery, connectivity, and tap behavior.

Recommended settings for maximizing battery life are to minimize GPS usage, reduce the interval for new images, and disable using tap for switching images.

data.author: ebolakid

changelog.release_notes:
- A small redesign of the themes on Pebble and Pebble Steel.
- Minor code refactoring and code clean-up.
- From now on, Halo 5 KDR is only compatible with Pebbles running 3.X firmware.

- Updated with more theme options for Pebble Time and Pebble Time Round.
- Bug fix: The K/D ratio will now be calculated correctly when a players' death count is zero.
- Added theme options on all Pebbles, choose your Halo 5 KDR flair!
- First release.

data.description:
Do you love Halo as much as you love your Pebble?

Do you normally brag about your amazing multiplayer stats?

Want to wear your Halo 5: Guardians Kill/Death ratio on your sleeve?

Then Halo 5 KDR is the watchface you have been waiting for! Simply glancetacular for fans of the Halo 5: Guardians multiplayer!

Halo 5 KDR shows your Kill/Death ratio from the last five multiplayer matches (Campaign missions excluded).

Enter your Xbox Live gamertag on the settings page and watch as the bars change in real time.

The scale adjusts automatically depending on your best ratio from the last five games.

How high can you go?

- Halo 5 KDR fetches data every 15 minutes.
- The matches flow from right to left, the rightmost game is your latest.
- Choose your Halo 5 KDR flair with configurable theme options! 
- Halo 5 KDR is not in any way affiliated or endorsed by Microsoft, Xbox, Xbox Live, or 343 Industries. No copyright infringement intended.
- Note: Uses data from the Halo 5 API, which is currently in Beta. Be aware that this app can be slow at times, or even break without prior notice.

latest_release.release_notes:
- A small redesign of the themes on Pebble and Pebble Steel.
- Minor code refactoring and code clean-up.
- From now on, Halo 5 KDR is only compatible with Pebbles running 3.X firmware.

data.title: Halo 5 KDR

Added an option to turn on vibration alert on bluetooth disconnect

This (hopefully) fixes a bug for Android users who were unable to set tick marks back to being arranged in a circle
If you have a rectangular screen you now have a setting to make the tick marks fit the rectangle instead of them being arranged in a circle
Added the option to add hour tickmarks
Shadows added! Enable the setting in the settings page to have the watch hands cast shadows
Fixed a bug where colors would not load with the watchface when they were set to black
Added a settings page where you can change the colors
This is the initial basic release of my Super Simple watchface. Watch this space for updates adding color options and more.

data.description:
Bip beeep blop bebloup bleep beep ! Here is your favorite StarWars robot ! 
Shake it & give love to BB8 !!
(and take a look at R2D2's FACE too !)
--
-- Colors -- Chooses the best ! 
You prefer black ? Blue ? Orange ? Plain background ? As you wish.
--
-- Weather -- Enable or disable it. 
Shake your wrist to update it, Celcius or Farenheit, API key, City or GPS ?... ENJOY !
--
-- Battery -- Enable or disable it. 
Look at the line between date and time ! Big ? It's ok ! Tiny ? Find an outlet !
--
-- Bluetooth -- Enable or disable it. You see the green (or red ??) round on BB8's body ?? Here is it ! 
-- 
-- Vibes --  Every Hour ? (if you want).
-- 
-- 
[FR] Watchface configurable : couleurs, météo, bluetooth, batterie et vibrations...
Une idée ? Une envie particulière, envoyez moi un mail !

latest_release.release_notes: Fix bug & add hour for vibes !

data.author: roparom

data.description:
Tell the time like a Time Lord with this Doctor Who themed watch-face for all Pebbles.

For the rest of us humans, here's how to tell the time:

Four digits are displayed in fixed positions on the screen. Hours are on the top circle, minutes on the bottom. i.e. HHMM

0 (ZERO) -  STRAIGHT LINE from the digit centre to the display edge.

1 (ONE) - STRAIGHT LINE from the digit centre to the opposite site.

2 (TWO) - ONE FULL CIRCLE.

3 (THREE) - TWO concentric CIRCLES.

4 (FOUR) - THREE concentric CIRCLES.

5 (FIVE) -  ONE HALF CIRCLE INSIDE a BASE circle.

6 (SIX) -  TWO HALF CIRCLES INSIDE a BASE circle.

7 (SEVEN) - THREE HALF CIRCLES INSIDE a BASE circle.

8 (EIGHT) - ONE HALF CIRCLE OUTSIDE a BASE circle.

9 (NINE) - 2 HALF CIRCLES OUTSIDE a BASE circle.

Based from Streea's edit of "Gallifrey Time". Originally designed by SzathmaryDominik, code by Bobert Perry.

latest_release.release_notes: Fix for black "zero"lines at 22:00

data.title: Gallifrey Round

data.description:
This is a paid watch-face. You can purchase this face individually for $0.99 or purchase our entire collection of 20+ faces for $5.99. You can purchase within the settings page.

Our newest face called Edge is ready for the wrists! Minutes are shown on the edge of the screen. Hour is displayed in the middle. The smaller text areas can be configurable to show the weather, date, exact minutes, and battery level. All colors can be configured with Kiezel's signature configuration page. If you like give us a heart on the Pebble Appstore. Thanks and enjoy!

Top Features Include:

Customize colors
Load animations
Customize text areas with battery, date, minutes, and weather
Pebble OG Support, Pebble Time Support, and Pebble Time Round Support

data.author: Andrey Stoev

changelog.release_notes: - changed the host for the configuration page

- fix to make the watchface "Local DST in Use" aware
- improved tick handle -> screen refresh and battery usage
- minor change in the hands design

- added DST indicator (Dual-Time)
- added "non-standard" TMZ indicator (Dual-Time)
- fixed a bug in the TMZ conversion

- color customization - 7 presets + 1 custom color set /w 11 elements
- support for non-standard TMZ offsets (TMZ :30 and TMZ:45 min offsets)
- major internal changes regarding color handling, settings and persistent storage
- new configuration page
- enhanced the Smart Dial behavior: When face displays "24" (unchecked "Use 0 hours"), the "24" will change to "0" when past the 24th hour
- small design change in the "True 24Hr Dial" mode (using primitive circles instead of custom path)

- changed the DT Offset behavior: Offset is now the actual Time Zone from GMT (example 0 = GMT) 
- DST is not accounted for
- DT - date in the calendar window will change color if there is a Day correction during DT display

- added Dual Time Mode on Flick - displays a second, custom Time Zone (+12/-12 hr offset from Local Time) 
- Dual Time is displayed with a Custom ID tag or if the field is empty, it will display the actual time offset 
- Date indicator reflects the actual date during Dual Time - it will show if the Dual Time falls in the next or previous date
- Added functionality: in 12Hr mode, the center shaft serves as an AM/PM indicator
- added a second set of numbers (3/9/15/21, smaller) to the 24hr Dial
- added a "True 24hr Dial" mode ("Submarine Clock Dial") (user-configurable)
- added a "True 24hr Dial" mode ("Submarine Clock Dial")  (user-configurable)
- minor design change (workaround for a Pebble rendering issue)
- color change for Day of The Week
- Flick or Tap for Day of the Week display - user configurable
- battery indicator enhancement - now showing the whole range 10 to 100%
- minor design improvement of the battery indicator

- added "Hide Date" window option to allow for further simplification of the look
- optimized heap memory usage
- version number aligned with TH10c
- added Simple Dial option - hides the 3-6-9 numerals for a more simplistic look
- Setup Code optimization

data.description:
This is a version of my TH10c watchface, specifically designed for Pebble Time Round (Chalk).
-Major changes: Layout design, Battery indicator design, refresh rate - every minute (opposed to 15 sec in TH10c)

Torgoen T10 inspired watchface (very similar to Bell & Ross 03-92), designed after Aircraft Instruments for an improved readability. The definitive analog watchface for aviation professionals / pilots.
This version is compiled with latest SDK and adds many new features, color for Pebble Time / Round and various user-configurable settings. 
5 Color Sets - "Glow-In-The-Dark" Green, Red&White and 2 Monochrome / Gray Color Sets (+ Hidden "Easter Egg" Orange Color Set) and a High-Contrast option.

High level of customization via configuration menu with 16 options - Invert Date, Hourly Vibrate, Use "0" Hours instead of "24", Force to 12Hr Mode, Show Seconds, Monochrome Mode, Bluetooth Connection Status - Visual and/or Haptic, Alternative Hands style (Hollow), Battery Meter, High-Contrast display, Simple Dial, Hide Date and Flick for Day of The Week and "True 24hr Dial" mode ("Submarine Dial").
There is a Battery Meter, showing battery charge levels from 10% to 100% 

Credits: Original 1.0 by Hudson, version 2.0 by Jnmattern, additional features by Roger Dodger. Testing - Mattias Elm.

latest_release.release_notes: - changed the host for the configuration page

data.title: TH10r

changelog.release_notes: 修复pebble time上报错的问题

抓住一个耗电的虫子

中国面子2特性
1、支持久坐提醒、带可爱小人提示和震动提示（让她与你一起生活、工作、学习）、她会提醒你该活动活动了！
2、久坐提醒设置支持多种时间范围、并可设置关闭提示时间区间！
3、支持电量百分比显示！
4、时间字体调大到一目了然的境界！
5、一年多少周和现在是一周的第几天巧妙的融合！（细心体会为啥说巧妙）
6、修复天气定时更新问题！

继承了中国面子1的如下所有优良品质！
1、全面支持地区显示、农历、天气、PM25(空气质量）的表盘，包括你日常需要的全部信息！
2、天气每小时自动更新，你也可手动切换表面刷新！
3、精确显示你的城市信息！
4、天气信息出自中国中央气象台准确实时信息！
5、包括中国农历！
6、空气质量除了包括PM25的指数，还包括空气污染级别！

请强烈点赞红星支持该国产应用！
关注我们的微信号:  pebblecn 了解更多pebble精彩应用！

如果有各种建议、吐槽或安装上的问题都请点击下面的website link进行讨论！

changelog.release_notes: Stores weather information so when the watchface is reloaded the weather appears instantly.
Fixed bug where Pebble and Pebble Steel watches couldn't alter settings.

Large text option for clearer viewing of text.
Fixed a bug where the temperature would stay on Celsius.
Unfortunately Pebble / Pebble Steel users can't change user settings with this release.

Fixed bug where second hand could be turned off.
Added option to hide the second hand when the battery is less than 20% to save battery.

Uses the phone's GPS location for the weather.
Can now get weather for the whole world (not just the USA).
Temperatures can be in Celsius or Fahrenheit.

Supports original monochrome Pebbles.

data.description:

Includes current weather conditions & forecast for your current location. Today's forecast is shown until 4pm, then tomorrow's forecast is shown. Temperatures in Celsius or Fahrenheit.

Shake the watch to move the hands to read the text more easily.

Let me know what changes you'd like in future versions.

changelog.release_notes: Initial version. Displays time, day of month, battery life and connection status + QR code is readable.

data.description:
Displays the time in a QR Code.

The time and day of month are written inside the QR code, as well as the Bluetooth connection status and the battery life.

The QR code is also a valid code giving the time, date, battery life and bluetooth connection status!

Pictures 1 & 2: 16:04 12/11/2015  80% BT:On
Pictures 3 & 4: 16:05 12/11/2015  20% BT:Off

The time and day of month are written in the middle of the code, as highlighted in pictures 2 and 4.
The Bluetooth connection status is the top left pixel (white = disconnected, black = connected).
The current battery level is displayed as a vertical bar on top right of the QR code.

latest_release.release_notes: Initial version. Displays time, day of month, battery life and connection status + QR code is readable.

data.title: QR Time Simple

data.author: tbhighlightz
data.description: A simple watchface that shows your battery level for your pebble and connection status.
data.title: Battery & Connection Status

data.author: Nev Rawlins

changelog.release_notes: Added support for Pebble firmware V4, Pebble 2 and Quick Views.

Reworked configuration.  Supports configuration when phone not connected to internet.  If phone is connected to internet, then configuration changes show on watch interactively. On black and white Pebble screens, foreground & background can be set independently, with additional background color: grey.

data.description:
An easy-to-read digital watch face, with numbers based on hexagons, designed by Lewis Kent, from the UK, and published with his permission.   

Displays in 12 or 24 hour mode, depending on watch settings.
  
Includes configuration options to change both foreground and background colors.
  
Version 1.1 supports configuration when phone not connected to internet.  If phone is connected to internet, then configuration changes show on watch interactively, but make sure you still save it or the config screen will forget it. 
  
Check out the examples to make sure you know how to read all the digits.
  
Screenshots show:  
(1) 06:45
(2) 09:08
(3) 12:37
(4) 23:59 (24 hour mode)
(5) 08:08 (with Quick View)

latest_release.release_notes: Added support for Pebble firmware V4, Pebble 2 and Quick Views.

data.title: Hex

data.description:
My take on one of my favourite watches, and a true icon of the 1990s.

Planned updates will include:
- Custom Colours
- Multiple date formats (currently YY  MM-DD)
- Show / Hide leading zeros
- Show / Hide seconds
- Temperature, Altitude, Barometer via GPS plus Compass

data.author: CWFranklin

changelog.release_notes:
Release 4.3.
Added 'Swedish' date format (ISO w/ dashes instead of slashes).
Updated specific smaller font for 12 hour clock.
Removed debug logging to avoid potential memory issues.

Changed to C for programming language.
Complete re-write. Added animation support that actually works for both Aplite and Basalt platforms.
Persistent settings and Chalk support coming at some point.

Added Date and basic animation support.
Animations are extremely experimental, if you enable them and have problems, turn them off! Do not use animations on the original Pebble or Pebble Steel unless you want a laugh.

If you want a date format added to the supported list, send an email to the support address provided.
Removed support for Aplite due to Pebble.JS not being good -.- Removed WatchType check which works on CloudPebble but not on an actual watch using Pebble.JS...
Added colour background for Basalt and a B/W image for Aplite support.
Initial version. Would like to add animation (files are there), but Pebble.js support is still limited.

data.description:
A colour version of the existing Pusheen watchface.
Originally coded using Pebble.js, this watchface has now been coded from the ground up in C.
Basic animation and dates can be enabled in settings.

Created for and dedicated to Emma Hamilton BA (ManaTime).

latest_release.release_notes:
Release 4.3.
Added 'Swedish' date format (ISO w/ dashes instead of slashes).

data.title: Pusheen Colour

data.author: John Clute

changelog.release_notes:
Changed the size of the font from 20 to 24, it will look more accurate now.
First release of ti-watch, this is a retro look, when the digital watches first came out. This is modeled mostly after the Texas Instrument LED Amber digital watch. Currently can't configure for 24 hour display just 12 hour. Currently wondering if it will added or not. 

New Version made watch face fonts larger.

data.description: A watch face based on the Texas Instrument amber Digital watch.  All it has it does is show time: hours and minutes, very simple like the watch it's self, however during the time it was quite advanced for the 70's.

Watchface with large, big, huge digits. A big font indeed.
The color of the digits can be changed to any Pebble color using the settings page.
With seconds (optional), weekday, day of the month, battery level (optional) and connection status (optional).
White or black background.

You can hide seconds, change the date format (MM/DD or DD/MM), change colours, and set a location.

data.description:
SchoolTime allows you to see the time left in each period. 
The configuration page allows you to change:
- Class Names
- All Colors
- Bluetooth/Battery Visibility
- Toggle Bluetooth Alarm

This watchface currently only works with a specific school day. 
We are working on allowing custom time inputs in the config page. 
Until then, you are able to get the source from github and change the times manually.

latest_release.release_notes: - Fixed Battery Location

data.title: School Time
